name: oversampling data to predict breasts cancer
description: check the target class and we can observe that it is a skewed hence oversampling is used to get a proper target classOversamplingsplitting the data setusing random forest This Python 3 environment comes with many helpful analytics libraries installed It is defined by the kaggle python Docker image https github. input directory For example running this by clicking run or pressing Shift Enter will list all files under the input directory You can write up to 20GB to the current directory kaggle working that gets preserved as output when you create a version using Save Run All You can also write temporary files to kaggle temp but they won t be saved outside of the current session. read_csv Input data files are available in the read only. com kaggle docker python For example here s several helpful packages to load linear algebra data processing CSV file I O e.
script: sklearn.ensemble sklearn.metrics sklearn.model_selection confusion_matrix collections imblearn.over_sampling seaborn numpy RandomForestClassifier pandas classification_report RandomOverSampler train_test_split Counter
entities: (('It', 'kaggle python Docker image https github'), 'check') (('t', 'outside current session'), 'list') (('read_csv Input data files', 'read'), 'be')
